# imports

```{r}

library(logger)
library(tidyverse)
library(tmap)


log_threshold(WARN)
theme_set(theme_minimal())

# scripts
source("projects/rdc-conf-2024-agser/agser.R", local = (agser <- new.env()))


```


# farms

```{r}
agser$agcensus(2022) %>% head() %>% collect()

```


# services

```{r}
rdc_res <- agser$get_rdc_results()

rdc_res$desc %>%
  filter(variable == "pay_cr1") %>%
  select(commodity, year, mean, `50%`) %>%
  pivot_longer(!c(commodity, year)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = value)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = name)) +
  facet_wrap("commodity")


```
